title.en: The Respiratory Spire of Eternal Flow

description.ko: 이 작품은 유기적인 호흡의 정수를 구현한 거대하고 살아있는 건축적 구조물을 묘사합니다. 이끼, 수정, 심해 생물의 질감을 결합하여 복잡한 생물 발광 생태계를 통해 순환하는 액체 빛으로서 '생명의 흐름'을 시각화합니다.
description.en: This piece depicts a massive, living architectural structure that embodies the essence of organic breathing. It combines the textures of moss, crystal, and deep-sea biology to visualize the 'flow of life' as liquid light circulating through a complex, bioluminescent ecosystem.

prompt: A towering, organic spire resembling a cross between a giant lung and a coral reef, constructed from translucent emerald moss and glowing amber vascular filaments. The structure sits at the center of a deep, dark green underwater abyss, pulsing with rhythmic bioluminescence. Liquid light flows through its translucent membranes like golden sap, exhibiting heavy subsurface scattering. Surrounding the spire are millions of tiny, glowing spores and wispy, translucent tendrils that dance in the slow current. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Features dramatic volumetric light shafts piercing through the #2D5A3D water, highlighting the #7FB069 mossy textures and #FFE66D glowing filaments. Global illumination reflecting off the #E6F2E1 organic membranes, cinematic lighting, sharp focus on the microscopic details of the breathing light.
